_sText:
This is the second and maybe last version of ba_jail_gothic :

i added some new funny stuff and fixed lot of minor bugs :

BUGS FIXED  :

-Fixed the axe's  stairs
-fixed the wrong texture in the bathroom
-fixed the window bug at the dining room with a little garden
-improved speed of the doors, and they now close themselves when they are blocked


NEW STUFF :

-medic terrorist, (see the screenshots)   -smoke grenade in the cell
-some env_spritetrail, useless but funny  -smoke grenade in the cell and in the tunnel
-fast terrorist                           -smoke grenade in the cell
-added a new tunnel  in the laundry (see the screenshots)
-the names of the rooms is now written at the top of the doors



old version : http://www.fpsbanana.com/maps/90528

vmf file : http://www.fpsbanana.com/mips/783
